thread.title: Still the Master? Defending champ Jordan Spieth early favorite to repeat at Augusta
thread.title_full: Still the Master? Defending champ Jordan Spieth early favorite to repeat at Augusta | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Still the Master? Defending champ Jordan Spieth early favorite to repeat at Augusta
text:
Even though the 2015 golf season is just winding down, it's not too early to project and predict things related to the 2016 campaign.
Which means it's not to early to talk about Jordan Spieth, who recently wrapped up the FedEx Cup Playoffs.
Spieth, who won his first two majors in 2015, claiming The Masters and the U.S. Open, is the early favorite to repeat as champion at Augusta National.
Kyle Porter, golf writer for CBSSports.com, lists Spieth as a slight favorite, according to Westgate Las Vegas Sportsbook.
Spieth is listed at 6-1, with Jason Day and Rory McIlroy both at 7-1.
No odds are listed for the U.S. Open, or whether Spieth can win the Grand Slam.
Maybe next week.
